document.title: Eiffel Envision Class View
document.paragraph:
EiffelEnvision projects also provide a compiled representation of the project(s) via the Visual Studio .NET vxoriViewingClassesTheirMembers 0 Class View . This view will be familar to users approaching EiffelEnvision having used ../../eiffelenvision_for_eiffelstudio_developers/index.xml EiffelStudio in the past. EiffelEnvision extends the vxurfClassViewWindow 0 Class View to provide context-specific information on ancestors and decendents of classes and features.
